TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypedList

summary.span: 提供发现可绑定列表架构的功能，其中可用于绑定的属性不同于要绑定到的对象的公共属性。

span.span: Provides functionality to discover the schema for a bindable list, where the properties available for binding differ from the public properties of the object to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果你使用的是表示 `customer` 表的 对象，则需要绑定到 表示的 `customer` 对象上的属性，而不是 的属性。Use this interface if, for instance, you are using a object that represents a `customer` table, you want to bind to the properties on the `customer` object that the represents, not the properties of the . 对于可绑定列表的设计时支持，不需要此接口。This interface is not required for design-time support of a bindable list. 绑定到数据可在运行时或在设计器中发生，但同时存在这两种情况的规则。Binding to data can occur either at run time or in a designer, but there are rules for both. 在运行时，可以通过以下任一操作绑定到数据：At run time, you can bind to data in any of the following: - - 的实施者，前提是实施者具有强类型 属性（即， 是除 以外的任何内容）。Implementer of , provided the implementer has a strongly typed property (that is, the is anything but ). 为此，可以将 的默认实现设为私有。You can accomplish this by making the default implementation of private. 如果要创建遵循强类型集合规则的 ，则应从 派生。If you want to create an that follows the rules of a strongly typed collection, you should derive from . - 的实施者。Implementer of . 在设计器中，可以通过遵循相同的规则来初始化到 对象的绑定。In a designer, you can initialize binding to objects by following the same rules. 有关绑定到数据源的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information on binding to a data source, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface. 名为 `SortableBindingList` 的泛型类型派生自 类并实现 接口。A generic type named `SortableBindingList` derives from the class and implements the interface. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅[如何：实现 ITypedList 接口](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/CS/SortableBindingList.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/VB/SortableBindingList.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetItemProperties(class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor[] listAccessors) cil managed
Public Function GetItemProperties (listAccessors As PropertyDescriptor()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

param.name: listAccessors
param.span: 要在组合中查找的可绑定的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects to find in the collection as bindable.

summary.span: 返回 ，其表示每一项上用于绑定数据的属性。

span.span: Returns the that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.

returns.span: ，其表示每一项上用于绑定数据的属性。

span.span: The that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `listAccessors` 参数不是 `null`，则它通常包含一个属性说明符，它标识要为实现 的对象检索的容器的列表。If the `listAccessors` parameter is not `null`, it typically contains a property descriptor that identifies a list of containers to retrieve for the object that implements . 例如，包含两个表的 ，`myCustomers` 和 `myOrders`，它们之间的关系称为 `myCustOrders`。For example, a containing two tables, `myCustomers` and `myOrders`, with a relationship between them called `myCustOrders`. 如果创建 对象来查看 `myCustomers`，则使用 `null` 调用 方法将返回 `myCustomers`中的列的属性说明符。If you create a object to view `myCustomers`, then calling the method with `null` returns the property descriptors for the columns in `myCustomers`. 因此，其中一个返回的属性描述符是 `myCustOrders`的属性说明符，就像使用包含属性说明符的列表访问器数组调用 方法时，`myCustOrders` 将为 `myOrders`返回属性说明符。As a result, one of the returned property descriptors is a property descriptor for `myCustOrders`, just as calling the method with a list accessor array containing the property descriptors for `myCustOrders` will return the property descriptors for `myOrders`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅[如何：实现 ITypedList 接口](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/CS/SortableBindingList.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ITypedList#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ITypedList/VB/SortableBindingList.vb#3)]

param.name: listAccessors
param.span: 为其返回列表名称的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects, for which the list name is returned.
Returns the name of the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅在设计时框架和过时的 控件中使用。This method is used only in the design-time framework and by the obsolete control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅[如何：实现 ITypedList 接口](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement the ITypedList Interface](~/docs/framework/winforms/how-to-implement-the-itypedlist-interface.md).
